message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Bob, I understand your offer, but I need to get at least $95 for the product. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it worth the extra investment. Let's meet in the middle!
Hi Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I'm still only able to pay up to $90 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
